snippet: Fordham (17-13) will host Boston University (18-14) on Wednesday in the first round of the CollegeInsider.com tournament, according to B.U.’s athletics website.
abstract: Fordham University men's basketball team will host Boston University in first round of CollegeInsider.com tournament.
lead_paragraph: Fordham (17-13) will host Boston University (18-14) on Wednesday in the first round of the CollegeInsider.com tournament, according to B.U.’s athletics website.
